thread.title: Iran nuclear deal hits milestone aimed at sanctions relief
thread.title_full: Iran nuclear deal hits milestone aimed at sanctions relief

author: KEVIN FREKING
title: Iran nuclear deal hits milestone aimed at sanctions relief
text:
Ebrahim Noroozi Iran nuclear deal hits milestone aimed at sanctions relief 
Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif speaks during the Munich Security Conference in Tehran, Iran, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (AP Photo/Ebrahim Noroozi) Posted: Sunday, October 18, 2015 1:56 pm | Updated: 6:00 pm, Sun Oct 18, 2015. Iran nuclear deal hits milestone aimed at sanctions relief Associated Press | 0 comments 
WASHINGTON (AP) — The U.S. expects Iran will take months to live up to its end of a seven-nation nuclear pact that could eventually provide the country relief from international sanctions. 
The deal formally took effect Sunday, opening the way for Iran to make major changes to an underground nuclear facility, a heavy water reactor and a site for enriching uranium. The changes will not happen immediately, and Iran must further constrain its nuclear program before relief from sanctions will occur. kAmQ%96D6 ?6IE DE6AD H:== 2==@H FD E@ C6249 E96 @3;64E:G6D H6 D6E @FE E@ 249:6G6 @G6C E96 4@FCD6 @7 ?62C=J EH@ J62CD @7 E@F89[ AC:?4:A=65 5:A=@>24J[Q !C6D:56?E q2C24< ~32>2 D2:5 :? 2 DE2E6>6?E]k^Am kAmQx 2> 4@?7:56?E :?
